ai-tha-ap47:1.2_0: if you take a stand in the middle of a great man,
ai-tha-ap47:2.3_0: With that I worshipped the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap47:3.3_0: and four great dragon kingdom in the great world.
ai-tha-ap47:4.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap47:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap47:5.1_0: after he has come down from here.
ai-tha-ap47:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable View.
ai-tha-ap47:8.1_0: The fifth Elder Nun Dhammadinnā was five hundred Theras.
